snippet.title: Shieldmaiden: Remix Edition
snippet.description:
👉┇Shieldmaiden: Remix Edition 
AVAIABLE NOW ON 
STEAM | NUUVEM | NINTENDO SWITCH | XBOX
https://solo.to/shieldmaiden

The end of the world just started and everyone is gone. The machines took over and your only goal is to look for your missing sister in a retro wave atmosphere. Fight and find your way into the danger.

⭐ 2D platform action-based gameplay
⭐ 9 levels packed with action-packed combat and puzzles, each with an epic boss fight
⭐ User-friendly and accessible gameplay and controls
⭐ Unique skills to be learned and mastered
⭐ Vibrant synthwave music and pixel art visuals
⭐ 5 hours of gameplay, including secrets and collectibles.
